CustomField.description: Total Engagement Score calculated from the Bokun Database and stored in a KPI table weekly. The data point represents the total score off over 20 engagement pieces for each account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Engagement Score calculated from the Bokun Database and stored in a KPI table weekly. The data point represents the total score off over 20 engagement pieces for each account.
CustomField.label: Engagement Score
